    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<ReadingTip> findAll()
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Lists all reading tips in the database.
        Returns:
        A list of reading tips.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • save

        public ReadingTip save(ReadingTip tip)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Saves one reading tip into the database.
        Parameters:
        tip - The new reading tip to be saved, id will be ignored.
        Returns:
        The reading tip which was just saved, with the id that was given for it in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • toggleRead

        public void toggleRead(int readingTipId)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Toggles the read value of a reading tip in the database.
        Parameters:
        readingTipId - The reading tip which read value will be toggled.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • bindTagsToReadingTip

        public void bindTagsToReadingTip(ReadingTip tip,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Tag> tags)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Binds tags which are already in the databese to a reading tip which is already in the databese.
        Parameters:
        tip - The reading tip with ID.
        tags - The tags of the reading tip with IDs.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • findOne

        public ReadingTip findOne(int readingTipId)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches for a reading tip in the database.
        Parameters:
        readingTipId - The ID of the reading tip which is being searched.
        Returns:
        The reading tip that was searched or null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • update

        public void update(ReadingTip tip)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the attributes of a reading tip in the database.
        Parameters:
        tip - The reading tip which attributes are being updated. Must have ID.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • findMaxReadPriority

        public int findMaxReadPriority()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Finds the maximum value of the attribute priority_read in the database's reading tip table.
        Returns:
        The maximum value of the attribute priority_read, 0 if there is no rows in the table, -1 if error occured.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • findMaxUnreadPriority

        public int findMaxUnreadPriority()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Finds the maximum value of the attribute priority_unread in the database's reading tip table.
        Returns:
        The maximum value of the attribute priority_unread, 0 if there is no rows in the table, -1 if error occured.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.
